title: Unit 2: Multiplication and Division Problems
text:
üí° Module 3: Interpret and Solve Problem Situations


Use problem-solving strategies to interpret and solve real-world and mathematical problems.

Start Module 3



üß† Module 4: Mental Math and Estimation


Develop mental math and estimation strategies to simplify calculations and check reasonableness.

Start Module 4



‚úñÔ∏è Module 5: Multiply by 1-Digit Numbers


Use place value and properties of operations to multiply whole numbers by one-digit numbers.

Start Module 5



‚ûó Module 6: Understand Division by 1-Digit Numbers


Build understanding of division by one-digit numbers using models and strategies.

Start Module 6



üìè Module 7: Divide by 1-Digit Numbers


Apply division strategies and properties to divide multi-digit numbers by one-digit divisors.

Start Module 7
